DataElement.preferredName: Patient Oriented Prostate Utility Scale 3 Last 2 Weeks Level of Support from Friends and Family Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation in the last two weeks describing their support from family and friends, using a 4 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Oriented Prostate Utility Scale Past 2 Weeks Level of Support from Friends and Family Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 10-item self-report questionnaire that measures quality of life for men with prostate cancer._A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present._A question about an individual's level of support from their friends and family._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 10-item self-report questionnaire that measures quality of life for men with prostate cancer.

Concepts.definition: A 10-item self-report questionnaire that measures quality of life for men with prostate cancer.

Property.preferredName: Past 2 Weeks Level of Support from Friends and Family Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present.:A question about an individual's level of support from their friends and family.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present.

Concepts.longName: Level of Support from Friends and Family
Concepts.definition: A question about an individual's level of support from their friends and family.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Patient Oriented Prostate Utility Scale Support 4 Point Scale

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Most Times Feel Supported by Spouse, Family, and Friends

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Most Times Feel Supported by Spouse, Family, and Friends
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual feels or felt supported by spouse, family, and friends at most times.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual feels or felt supported by spouse, family, and friends at most times.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual feels or felt supported by spouse, family, and friends a fair amount of the time.

Concepts.longName: Fair Amount of Time Feel Supported by Spouse, Family, and Friends
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual feels or felt supported by spouse, family, and friends a fair amount of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual feels or felt supported by spouse, family, and friends only occasionally.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Quality of Life Measures (Patient Reported Outcomes - Health Related Quality of Life)

ReferenceDocuments.name: Please choose the statement t
ReferenceDocuments.description: Please choose the statement that comes closest to describing your support from family and friends in the last two weeks.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Scoring Manual Link
ReferenceDocuments.description: The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.

DataElement.origin: PORPUS:Patient Oriented Prostate Utility Scale, Krahn M, Ritvo P, Irvine J, et al., J Clin Epidemiol 2000
